Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: The building of the Children's Medical Centre of Israel was started in April 1988, The complex is located next to the Beilinson Hospital in Petach Tikvah and when completed next year it will be the next advanced and comprehensive children's hospital in an area between southern Europe, southeast Asia and southern Africa, The $60 million, 224 bed hospital will together with the adjacent Beilinson Medical Centre become the largest medical complex in Israel, The medical staff, which will include internationally recognized pediatric specialists as well as the latest medical equipment, The hospital will have a special relationship with the Schneider Children's Hospital of the Long Island Jewish Medical Center in the U,S, as well as other internationally know children's medical institutions, Helen and Irving Schneider have also been a major benefactor to this new project.

sequences.label: The building of the Children's Medical Centre of Israel was started in April 1988  The complex is located next to the Beilinson Hospital in Petach Tikvah and when completed next year it will be the next advanced and comprehensive children's hospital in an area between southern Europe  southeast Asia and southern Africa  The $60 million  224 bed hospital will together with the adjacent Beilinson Medical Centre become the largest medical complex in Israel  The medical staff  which will include internationally recognized pediatric specialists as well as the latest medical equipment  The hospital will have a special relationship with the Schneider Children's Hospital of the Long Island Jewish Medical Center in the U S  as well as other internationally know children's medical institutions  Helen and Irving Schneider have also been a major benefactor to this new project.
